it.polimi.se2019.Network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.Network.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIServer, SocketServer

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Server is the main class, being responsible of supervising network actions such as new connections and data sharing, generating players data, and managing a complete match.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Player> connectedPlayers
      This array stores all the connected players of the specific match.
      static int lobbyTimer
      It's the value prompted by anyone responsible of starting a server.
      static int LOGINRMIPORT
      Static port where an RMI client needs to connect to perform the login routine.
      static int LOGINSOCKETPORT
      Static port where a socket client needs to connect to perform the login routine.
      static boolean matchFinished
      True if all the needed conditions are met for the match to be declared as finished, and the winner leaderboard needs to be resolved.
      static boolean matchStarted
      True if the server has ended its login routine and has started a match.
      static java.util.Hashtable playerClient
      This hashtable is responsible of keeping all the player and corresponding clients associations for network messaging.
      static java.util.Hashtable registrations
      This hashtable is responsible of keeping all the username and password associations needed for login purposes.
      static int RMIPORT
      Static port where an RMI client needs to connect to perform the game routine.
      static int SOCKETPORT
      Static port where a socket client needs to connect to perform the game routine.
      static boolean start
      True if all the coditions to start a Match are met.

        public static volatile boolean matchStarted
        True if the server has ended its login routine and has started a match.

      • matchFinished

        public static volatile boolean matchFinished
        True if all the needed conditions are met for the match to be declared as finished, and the winner leaderboard needs to be resolved.

        True if all the coditions to start a Match are met.

        public static java.util.Hashtable registrations
        This hashtable is responsible of keeping all the username and password associations needed for login purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • connectedSize

        public static int connectedSize()
        Returns the number of players connected to the lobby
        Returns:
        the number of players in the lobby.

      • newPlayer

        public static Player newPlayer(java.lang.String u,
                               java.lang.String p,
                               java.lang.String connection)
        Recives approved credentials and builds the Player class, responsible of collecting all the player's data.
        Parameters:
        u - is the provided and verified username of the player.
        p - is the password used for the unique reconnection purposes.
        connection - stores the type of a player's connection.
        Returns:
        a Player class containing all the above information.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts the server, initializes connections and await players. After the players are officially logged and the timer ends, starts a new game.

      • updateWithAnswer

        public static java.lang.String updateWithAnswer(Player player,
                                                java.lang.String msg)
        Is one of the communication methods between Server and clients. The method sends to the player a String, and listens for a player's answer.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player that will receive the string.
        msg - is the information to push to the player.
        Returns:
        the player's answer

      • update

        public static void update(Player player,
                          java.lang.String msg)
        Pushes a string to a single player, and expects no answer from his side.
        Parameters:
        player - Is the player that will receive the message.
        msg - is the information to push to the player.

      • updateAll

        public static void updateAll(java.lang.String msg)
        Pushes a single message to all the connected clients and expects no answer from anyone.
        Parameters:
        msg - is the message to push to the clients.
